pageProduct.name: Vagisil ProHydrate External Hydrating Gel 30g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Lets talk about dryness, shall we?

Women of all ages experience vaginal dryness, not just women going through menopause. It's uncomfortable, frustrating and can make sex extremely painful. We know lubricants tend to be messy and can interrupt the moment, so we created Vagisil ProHydrate. It provides vaginla dryness relief and feels like your own natural moisture. Because when you feel like yourslef, you can enjoy intimacy without interruptions.

We'll help you find the right product for you:

Vagisil ProHydrate Plus External Hydrating Gel

Instant relief form vaginal dryness. Vaginal dryness can occur at any stage of life, and can affect your intimate relationship. Vagisil ProHydrate Plus External Hydrating Gel relieves and replenishes dry, uncomfortable vaginal skin, to make intimacy more comfortable. Leaving intimate skin, hydrated, supple and more comfortable.

Vagisil ProHydrate Plus Internal Hydrating Gel

Long-lasting relief form vaginal dryness. Vagisil ProHydrate Plus Internal Hydrating Gel provides long-lasting relief from vaginal dryness to make intimacy more enjoyable and bring your confidence back. The uniue bio-adherent formula coats the vaginal wall and slowly releases moisture over time to relieve vaginal dryness so you can feel comfortable and ready whenever the moment is right.

Always read the instructions for use. Follow the instructions for use. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.

Adcheck # AC10581-1220A

General Information

Vagisil ProHydrate External Hydrating Gel provides instant relief from vaginal dryness for more comfortable intimacy and restored confidence. pH balanced it contains ProHydrate® Complex comprising of a unique blend of moisturisers including Hyaluronic Acid that mimics a woman's own natural moisture. Ideal for every day use, it leaves intimate skin feeling hydrated, supple and more comfortable during intimacy. Gynaecologist and scientifically tested with no added perfumes, dyes, preservatives, estrogens.

Size: 30g

KEY FEATURES

• Contains ProHydrate Complex, a blend of unique moisturisers including hyaluronic acid.
• Instantly relieves vaginal drynes.
• Ideal for daily use.
• Feels like your natural moisture.

Warnings

This product is not a contraceptive and does not contain a spermicide. Keep out of reach of children. If pregnant or breast-feeding consult your healthcare professional before use.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Propanediol, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions

Use as needed to relieve and replenish dry, uncomfortable vaginal skin and as part of a regular intimate care routine.
